title: Guardiola angry at ref, Klopp says Liverpool survived 'whirlwind'
text:
Guardiola angry at ref, Klopp says Liverpool survived 'whirlwind' 10:00am BST - 01:29 
Manchester City's Pep Guardiola exlains why he was sent off at half-time by referee in Champions League tie, while Liverpool's Juergen Klopp praises his side for surviving City 'whirlwind'. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
